verbose_text: Previously, we have demonstrated that inhibitors of gamma-secretase, an enzyme required for Notch1 activation, can attenuate the severity of RA indices and suppress proinflammatory cytokines (TNF-alpha, IFN-gamma, IL-6, IL-12, IL-17 and MCP-1), NF-kappaB, and MMP-3 in RA synoviocytes and in collagen induced arthritis (CIA) mice XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: gamma-secretase, an enzyme required for Notch1 activation, can attenuate the severity of RA indices and suppress proinflammatory cytokines (TNF-alpha, IFN-gamma, IL-6, IL-12, IL-17 and MCP-1), NF-kappaB
